Trace needs internet to help you out.

Type you own me [three letter currency] [money owed] and send the message to your friend so that Trace can help you keep track of your money. Similarly you can type I owe you [three letter currency] [money owed] and send the message to let your friend know what you owe him/her.

Example:
You owe me USD 50.
I owe you INR 70.
Please note that you can use maximum of one occurrence of either "you owe me" or "I owe you" in a single message.
